name: Stoopidformer
description:
Stoopidformer is a rage-platformer game created by me, and drawn by my little brother.  Please report any and all bugs to me. 

It supports English, French and Spanish

System requirements:

Linux: 64-bit only,  2+ GBs of RAM

Windows: 32 or 64-bit 4+ GBs of RAM

Mac: 500$,  4+ GBs of RAM
